sig_info: Launching a Special Attack grants Storm 1 Prowess Buff per level of Special Attack used. Additionally, each Prowess on Storm, to a maximum of 10, increases the Potency of her Shock Debuffs by +5%.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Storm’s control of the elements grants her Immunity to Shock effects.
PROWESS BUFFS: Unless otherwise stated, Storm’s Prowess Buffs last 20 seconds and grant +20% Special Attack damage.
Each time either Champion lands a Critical Hit, gain 1 Prowess Buff(s).
Each time the opponent Purifies a Debuff, gain 2 Prowess Buff(s).
Each time Storm gains a Bleed effect, gain 2 Prowess Buff(s).
Each time Storm’s Immunity prevents a Shock effect, gain 2 Prowess Buff(s).
PASSIVE: If a Skill Opponent Purifies a Stun Debuff it is replaced with a Passive Stun lasting 2 seconds.
ALL ATTACKS: While charging or launching a Heavy Attack, all Prowess effects on Storm are Paused. Knocking the opponent down with this attack Pauses all Prowess effects on Storm for 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit has a 70% chance to inflict a Shock Debuff, causing 43.5 Energy Damage over 6 seconds.
If the opponent is Stunned, the Shock chance becomes 100% and all Shocks on the opponent are Paused for 6 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: First hit: Gain 1 Prowess Buffs.
Final hit: 100% chance to inflict a 3 second(s) Stun Debuff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to gain a non-stacking Precision Buff, increasing Critical Rating by +685.71 for 45 seconds.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Storm’s control of the elements grants her Immunity to Shock effects.
PROWESS BUFFS: Unless otherwise stated, Storm’s Prowess Buffs last 20 seconds and grant +20% Special Attack damage.
Each time either Champion lands a Critical Hit, gain 1 Prowess Buff(s).
Each time the opponent Purifies a Debuff, gain 2 Prowess Buff(s).
Each time Storm gains a Bleed effect, gain 2 Prowess Buff(s).
Each time Storm’s Immunity prevents a Shock effect, gain 2 Prowess Buff(s).
PASSIVE: If a Skill Opponent Purifies a Stun Debuff it is replaced with a Passive Stun lasting 2 seconds.
ALL ATTACKS: While charging or launching a Heavy Attack, all Prowess effects on Storm are Paused. Knocking the opponent down with this attack Pauses all Prowess effects on Storm for 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit has a 70% chance to inflict a Shock Debuff, causing 1796.5 Energy Damage over 6 seconds.
If the opponent is Stunned, the Shock chance becomes 100% and all Shocks on the opponent are Paused for 6 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: First hit: Gain 1 Prowess Buffs.
Final hit: 100% chance to inflict a 3 second(s) Stun Debuff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to gain a non-stacking Precision Buff, increasing Critical Rating by +942.86 for 45 seconds.
